HeroPage.description: This is the place where your journey towards the family home you've always imagined begins.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.intro: Raolen Gradnja is a real estate company located in the heart of Inđija. Our projects are characterized by high construction standards, innovative design, and careful space planning.
AboutPage.vision: Our vision is simple - to create real estate that meets everyone's expectations. We take into account your needs, desires, and future plans to create a space that reflects your unique story and lifestyle.
AboutPage.inovationText: We consider the latest trends in the construction industry, but we also encourage creativity to create unique and original concepts.
AboutPage.designText: Design is not just about aesthetics, but also about functionality. Carefully designed spaces combine elegance and practicality.
AboutPage.manufacturingText: Quality construction involves the use of premium materials, careful planning, and project execution to create homes that last.

PlanPage.title: Plan
PlanPage.p: Our plan involves the construction of 40 high-quality apartments. The portfolio we are building reflects diversity and a careful approach to projects that are tailored to different clients' needs.
PlanPage.p2: The total area of the apartments exceeds 1,800 square meters. Our plan and program also include 40 parking spaces, so each apartment has a parking space. The average area of the apartments is 45 square meters.

LocationPage.title: Location
LocationPage.p: We are located not far from the center of Inđija, yet situated in a quiet part of the city. We present to you all the advantages of the place where we are located.

FacilitiesPage.title: Facilities
FacilitiesPage.p: One of the key elements of our philosophy is the introduction of additional amenities within the buildings, creating a vibrant micro-environment. In our facilities, you will find more than just residential space. We offer additional conveniences that make our residents' lives simpler and more enjoyable.
FacilitiesPage.marketText: One of the potential options is to provide our residents with the privilege of enjoying their own market. This market offers a wide range of fresh groceries, essential supplies, and products crucial for everyday life. Our market is here to simplify your daily routine, allowing you to get everything you need without leaving the comfort of your home.
FacilitiesPage.cafeText: The cafe within Raolen Construction is not just a place for coffee; it is a social hub where neighbors, friends, and families meet. This cafe is designed as a cozy space for relaxation, working from home, or informal gatherings. With a wide array of beverages and delicious treats, our cafe becomes a favorite spot for all residents, creating an atmosphere of community and friendship.
FacilitiesPage.playroomText: For the families that are part of our community, we have specifically designed a space that will delight the youngest members. Our children's playroom is a safe place where kids can play freely, learn, and grow. This space is carefully designed with the safety and needs of children in mind, providing them with the opportunity to enjoy playing in the immediate vicinity of their home.

ApartmentsPage.title: Find an Apartment that Fits You
ApartmentsPage.p: Choose an apartment from our offer that suits your needs.
ApartmentsPage.apartments1: One and a Half Bedroom Apartments

ProjectsPage.title: Projects
ProjectsPage.p: We present to you our other projects in the portfolio.
ProjectsPage.projectText: In the heart of Niš, between historical monuments and modern buildings, there is an innovative real estate company named 'Niš Real Estate Solutions'. This company is not just a mediator in the sale and purchase of real estate but also an architect of life, connecting people with their dream homes.
ProjectsPage.projectText2: In the heart of Šumadija, in one of the most picturesque cities in Serbia, a remarkable real estate company named 'Kragujevac Real Estate Hub' has blossomed. This agency is not just a mediator in real estate transactions; it is a pillar of the community, connecting people with their dream homes and improving the quality of life in Kragujevac.
ProjectsPage.label: Apartments

Footer.title: Contact
Footer.subTitle: We are here for all your questions, write to us!
